metadata.title: CVE-2023-3090 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the Linux Kernel ipvlan networkdriver can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Theout-of-bounds write is caused by missing skb->cb initialization in theipvlan network driver. The vulnerability is reachable if CONFIG_IPVLAN isenabled. We recommend upgrading past commit90cbed5247439a966b645b34eb0a2e037836ea8e.
